basic.floral_language:
Echeveria pulidonis
Floriography: glamorous, gentle, pure
Echeveria pulidonis has a beautiful lotus plant shape with fleshy leaves of gray-green to blue-green surface with a thin layer of white powder, spoon-shaped blade with tip. Leaf edges turn red under abundant light and a great diurnal temperature range, very glamorous. For its bright colors, often used in potted combo planting. Echeveria pulidonis likes light, avoid strong sunlight in summer noon time, has a short dormant period in winter. Sometimes blooms with yellow flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, flowering period in spring with yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color gray green to blue green, when sunny leaf edges turning to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: But avoid direct strong light at noon in summer, dormant in winter
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, stop watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
